name: No-Soak Chickpeas for Cold Salad
instructions: Turn Instant Pot to Sauté mode. Add olive oil (if using), onion, and garlic. Cook until softened, about 3–4 minutes.
Add coriander, cumin, paprika, turmeric, salt, and pepper. Stir for 30–60 seconds to bloom the spices.
Add unsoaked, rinsed chickpeas, diced tomatoes with juice, and 3 cups water or broth. Stir to combine.
Cancel Sauté mode. Lock the lid and set Instant Pot to Manual (High Pressure) for 45 minutes.
Let the pressure naturally release for 15 minutes, then manually release any remaining pressure.
Stir in lemon juice. Adjust seasoning to taste.
Let cool completely. Store in the fridge and use in cold salads with brown rice, vegetables, and your favorite dressing.
